snippet: That massacre in the village of Attagara was the bloodiest in a series of attacks by Boko Haram this week in Nigeria’s far north, according to officials.
abstract: Nigerian officials say massacre in village of Attagara, in which Boko Haram men opened fire, killing scores of villagers, is bloodiest in series of attacks by sect; deadly assaults have become so pervasive that officials say group has established virtual control over entire area in country's far northeast; apparent lack of military intervention is likely to renew questions about capacity of Nigerian armed forces to confront Boko Haram.
lead_paragraph: That massacre in the village of Attagara was the bloodiest in a series of attacks by Boko Haram this week in Nigeria’s far north, according to officials.

headline.main: Nigerian Sect Kills Villagers Along Border
